dmca.title: Framing challenged as infringement
dmca.body:
Dear [private], [private], [private] and [private]:

I am writing to you on behalf of Mr. Bill Coleman, President, Bill Coleman, State College, Pennsylvania, regarding your illegal framing of AmishPhoto.com [ http://AmishPhoto.Com ] to provide "Amish Images
dmca.recipient_name: The Family Gathering & E-Market Media, Inc.
